title: Two teen girls, two men shot outside Brooklyn housing development
content:
Two teenage girls and two men were shot and wounded outside a Brooklyn housing development Saturday night, and police were looking for a man as the single shooter.
The victims had all gathered outside the Cypress Hill Houses on Fountain Ave. near Blake Ave. when an argument led to gunshots just after 9 p.m., cops said.
Two men, ages 20 and 21, and a girl, 16, were shot in the leg, while a 15-year-old girl was blasted in the back and arm, cops said.
All four were taken to Brookdale Hospital, and were expected to survive their injuries, police said.
